title: Top 3 Metaverses To Watch Out For In 2023
description: Once thought to be a far-fetched notion, rooted primarily in the realm of science fiction, the idea of a digital metaverse has garnered a lot of traction over the last couple of years. In fact, owing to the social, monetary, and technological potential possessed by this burgeoning digital paradigm, many analysts believe that the space could generate up to $5 trillion over the next 7 odd years.

title: Lawyers Push SEC to Approve Grayscale Bitcoin ETF ‘Expeditiously’
description: Lawyers representing crypto asset manager Grayscale Investments urged the Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) to “expeditiously” approve a spot bitcoin exchange-traded fund (ETF) in a letter sent to the agency. Grayscale’s letter follows a unanimous ruling by a panel of the U.S. Court of Appeals for the D.C. Circuit Court on August 29 that vacated […]

title: Ethereum layer-2 network Base suffers temporary outage
description: The Ethereum Layer-2 network known as Base experienced a brief outage that lasted for approximately half an hour, with full resolution taking an additional 30 minutes. The team reported the incident on Twitter, stating that the delay in block production was due, in part, to the need for a refresh of their internal infrastructure. Importantly, ... Read more

title: Justin Beiber’s hit song Company to be released as NFT
description: In a groundbreaking move set for September 7, anotherblock, a blockchain-centric music technology platform, collaborates with Andreas Schuller, known as Axident, to release the hit track “Company” as a nonfungible token (NFT), with only 2,000 copies available. Global pop icon Justin Bieber’s song will be transformed into an NFT, providing fans with a unique opportunity ... Read more

title: Lawyers question SBF can prepare for trial, prosecutors disagree
description: Former FTX CEO Sam Bankman-Fried’s lawyers question whether he can prepare for trial, while prosecutors claim that his bail revocation appeal is meritless. According to a Sept. 6 Decrypt report, SBF’s lawyers argue that he “will not have a meaningful…

title: Polkadot’s Paradigm-Shift: Unveiling the Future of Decentralization
description: Almost ten projects built on the Polkadot network have successfully expanded their structure over the last few months. Notably, the Astar Network and the Integritee network are making a mark and changing the game for their respective users.  The Polkadot network is thriving and new milestones have been attained as expected. title: While Avalanche (AVAX) and Cardano Continue to Decline, Pikamoon to Soar 100x After Launch
description: Amidst the current bearish market conditions, several investors, including those with investments in AVAX and Cardano seek clarity and a chance to jump ship. title: Binance Is Committed to Building a User-Centric Community
description:
Binance’s basic principle of being laser-focused on its users is at the heart of its business. From the ground floor to the very top, they all keep their community at the forefront of everything they do.
